brocadeVcsMIB.name: brocadeVcsMIB
brocadeVcsMIB.contactinfo: 130 Holger Way, San Jose, CA 95134 USA. Phone: +1-408-333-8000 Email: vivekk@brocade.com
brocadeVcsMIB.description: The MIB module for the monitoring of VCS fabrics. VCS fabrics is a proprietary technology of Brocade. A VCS fabric consists of a set of inter-connected Brocade VDX switches. These set of switches together behave like a single L2 switch to the outside world. The cluster can operate in 2 modes: fabric mode and Logical chassis mode. In fabric mode, the switches together behave like a single L2 switch - but configuration on each switch is independent of the other. In logical chassis mode, one switch in the fabric is elected as the principal switch. All configurations need to be done only from the principal switch. This is synced across to all the switches in the fabric. Thus the configuration information is the same on all the switches.

VcsConfigMode.name: VcsConfigMode
VcsConfigMode.description: The configuration mode that is in effect in the VCS fabric. local(1) - configuration is local to the switch. distributed(2) - configuration is to be done from the principal switch and will be the same across all the switches in the fabric.

VcsOperationMode.name: VcsOperationMode
VcsOperationMode.description: The operational mode of the fabric. fabricCluster(1) - the entire set of switches in the cluster behaves like a single L2 switch to the outer world. However, configuration is local to each switch. logicalChassis(2) - in this case the fabric behaves like a single L2 switch and the configuration is driven from the principal switch and is the same across all switches in the fabric.

VcsIdentifier.name: VcsIdentifier
VcsIdentifier.description: A number that uniquely identifies a fabric. Two different fabrics would have different identifiers.

VcsRbridgeId.name: VcsRbridgeId
VcsRbridgeId.description: A number that uniquely identifies a switch within a fabric.

VcsClusterCondition.name: VcsClusterCondition
VcsClusterCondition.description: The state of the fabric as a whole. good(1) - indicates that all switches are in good condition and cluster is fine. degraded(2) - indicates that one or more switches are offline and cluster has degraded. error(3) - Internal error state.

vcsConfigMode.name: vcsConfigMode
vcsConfigMode.description: The configuration mode of this cluster that is in effect.

vcsModeOfOperation.name: vcsModeOfOperation
vcsModeOfOperation.description: The operational mode of this cluster.

vcsIdentifier.name: vcsIdentifier
vcsIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of this cluster.

vcsVirtualIpV4Address.name: vcsVirtualIpV4Address
vcsVirtualIpV4Address.description: The virtual IPv4 address of the cluster. Management stations can use this address to send requests.

vcsVirtualIpV6Address.name: vcsVirtualIpV6Address
vcsVirtualIpV6Address.description: The virtual IPv6 address of the cluster. Management stations can use this address to send requests.

vcsVirtualIpAssociatedRbridgeId.name: vcsVirtualIpAssociatedRbridgeId
vcsVirtualIpAssociatedRbridgeId.description: The rbridge-id of the switch that hosts the virtual IP address.

vcsVirtualIpInterfaceId.name: vcsVirtualIpInterfaceId
vcsVirtualIpInterfaceId.description: The interface Id that is configured in the case of inband configuration. If it is not inband configuration, then this object will contain the value 0.

vcsVirtualIpV4OperStatus.name: vcsVirtualIpV4OperStatus
vcsVirtualIpV4OperStatus.description: The operational status of the virtual IPv4 address.

vcsVirtualIpV6OperStatus.name: vcsVirtualIpV6OperStatus
vcsVirtualIpV6OperStatus.description: The operational status of the virtual IPv6 address.

vcsNumNodesInCluster.name: vcsNumNodesInCluster
vcsNumNodesInCluster.description: The number of switches in the cluster that are currently online.

vcsClusterCondition.name: vcsClusterCondition
vcsClusterCondition.description: The condition of the cluster as a whole.

vcsFabricIslTable.name: vcsFabricIslTable
vcsFabricIslTable.description: This table contains all the ISLs (Inter Switch Link) on the local device.

vcsFabricIslEntry.name: vcsFabricIslEntry
vcsFabricIslEntry.description: Represents a single Inter Switch Link (ISL) on this switch.

vcsFabricIslIndex.name: vcsFabricIslIndex
vcsFabricIslIndex.description: A unique id to distinguish this ISL from others on the local device.

vcsFabricIslIntfName.name: vcsFabricIslIntfName
vcsFabricIslIntfName.description: The interface name (ifName) of the interface on which the ISL is formed on this switch.

vcsFabricIslNbrIntfName.name: vcsFabricIslNbrIntfName
vcsFabricIslNbrIntfName.description: The interface name (ifName) of the interface on the neighboring switch for this ISL.

vcsFabricIslNbrWWN.name: vcsFabricIslNbrWWN
vcsFabricIslNbrWWN.description: The World Wide Name (WWN) of the neighboring switch for this ISL.

vcsFabricIslNbrName.name: vcsFabricIslNbrName
vcsFabricIslNbrName.description: The name of the neighboring switch on which this ISL is formed.

vcsFabricIslIsTrunk.name: vcsFabricIslIsTrunk
vcsFabricIslIsTrunk.description: An indication whether this ISL is a trunk interface. A value of true(1) means it is a trunk. A value of false(2) means it is not a trunk.

brocadeVcsCompliance.name: brocadeVcsCompliance
brocadeVcsCompliance.description: The compliance information for this MIB.

brocadeVcsObjectsGroup.name: brocadeVcsObjectsGroup
brocadeVcsObjectsGroup.description: The MIB objects related to VCS monitoring.
